sentences.english: The heart is one of first organs to form during organogenesis in the vertebrate.

sentences.english: Typically, intracardiac catheters are positioned in the right atrium and in the coronary sinus.

sentences.english: Signs include exercise intolerance, but often there is only a heart murmur.

sentences.english: Tiffany told me and the police that he had a heart stroke while they were in bed.

sentences.english: The virus triggered myocarditis, a serious inflammation of the heart muscle.
